root.name: LostWinds: Winter of the Melodias
root.description: OverviewLost Winds: Winter of the Melodias is a direct sequel to the original Lost Winds and follows the continuing adventures of Toku and Enril in their effort to save Mistralis from the shadowy Balasar. In this adventure, Toku's mother has been abducted and taken to the grand city of Melodias, and Toku and Enril must race against time to save her. New Powers Lost Winds: Winter of the Melodias retains all the wind power mechanics from the previous game, as well as adding new ones, including the power to summon cyclones and change the weather from winter to summer at will, which will be instrumental in navigating the world and solving it's many puzzles.
